descripcion: Offering modern rooms with free WiFi, the Sercotel Madrid Aeropuerto is 5 minutes’ drive from Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport. descripcion: Located in the center of Madrid, a few meters from Paseo del Prado and Atocha Station, the gateway to Madrid of high speed trains (AVE), Hotel Catalonia Atocha benefits from a strategic location; one step away from the main museums and tourist attractions of the capital and in an area of ​​great commercial and leisure activity. The hotel is complemented by a café-snack bar, a restaurant for conventions and events, free Wi-Fi and a beautiful terrace with heated seasonal jacuzzi with spectacular views over the city.
